doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.AlternateContinuousCA
Takes the average of the cell and its neighbors, plugs into the linear equation "slope * avg + yInterecept", and then keeps only the fractional part.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.ContinuousCA
Takes the average of the cell and its neighbors, plugs into the linear equation "slope * avg + yInterecept", and then keeps only the fractional part.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.CyclicPulse
Cells always increase in value, but they increase by double the normal amount if surrounded by 4 or more neighbors with larger values.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.GalacticFlashWeb
Cells always increase in value, but they increase by double the normal amount if surrounded by 6 or more neighbors with larger values.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.MajorityWinsWithRealValues
The cell takes the closer value of two randomly selected neighbors.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.MajorityWinsWithSelfAndReals
Cells becomes the median value of themselves and their neighbors.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.RealSpirals
Cells always increase in value, but they increase by double the normal amount if surrounded by 2 or more neighbors with larger values.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.ThunderStorm
Takes the average of the cell and neighbors, adds a small random amount, and modulos by the maximum value.
doubleRule(double, double[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.WaterSkimmers
Takes the average of the cell and neighbors, adds a small random amount, and modulos by the maximum value.
